name: Fish for Sphere
description:
Welcome to Fish for Sphere's presentation page! This mobile game can be played on Windows too.

You control a fish in deep water by rotating left or right . To score you have to create holes to kill others fish . The precious gems dropped by others fish can be used to buy skins in the shop !

Rotate : A/D
Create one hole : Space
Navigate in UI : Mouse

Made by Gabriel ROULEAU with help of Sacha D, Cristopher C, Anatole H, Nicolas M and Kayo S. Thanks!
